law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 166, sec. 10, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 105, sec. 21, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 4, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 287, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 422, sec. 23, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 325, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 33, sec. 43, effective June 18, 1970.
